name: Battle High School
overview: The founder of a prestigious girls' high school comes back after 20 years of absence, in order to begin a fighting tournament in honor of a great female fighter of the past. Condition: the fighter should not only be adept at martial arts, but also be exceptionally pretty! Four girls are chosen to compete; which one will win?.. Battle High School looks like a fighting game, but the fights use a slot machine system. The player has to stop a spinning slot machine in order to execute a move. The moves include attack, super attack, refresh, and super refresh; there are also plenty of "miss" slots. There is no other gameplay involved but pressing a button to stop the slot machine. The defeated girl undresses after the battle.
